price: 45.sinni nafsi koroosannut yudlume marih dabooqal dabqih gacten ken bayisnek lakat, xaaguu kee mablal inkih keenik kah abne inni baxxaqqa siinih iyye, Qhuraanal ceelalloola siinih noogoreeh isin elle makaskassoowinton.
arabic: وَسَكَنتُمۡ فِي مَسَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ فَعَلۡنَا بِهِمۡ وَضَرَبۡنَا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wasakantum fī masākini alladhīna ẓalamū anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa faʿalnā bihim waḍarabnā lakumu al-amthāla
